title: BRIEF-Danaher Reports Q1 Adjusted Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.99
text:
April 19, 2018 / 10:13 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Danaher Reports Q1 Adjusted Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.99 Reuters Staff 
April 19 (Reuters) - Danaher Corp: * DANAHER REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS 
* SEES Q2 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.07 TO $1.10 
* SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $4.38 TO $4.45 * SEES Q2 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.88 TO $0.91 
* Q1 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.99 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.80 
* Q1 REVENUE $4.7 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $4.55 BILLION 
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.94 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $4.40 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.08 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
